title: Leading smartphone and tablet activities 2017 , by device
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 17 different Responses on X-axis for 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of respondents.
For Response E-mail, Smartphone had the highest Percentage of respondents 59.0 among the 2 groups and in Trading securities/shares online, Tablet had the lowest Percentage of respondents 4.0.
Response Watching movies/videos online and Trading securities/shares online had the biggest gap of 19.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of respondents found for Tablet.

On average, the Response E-mail had the highest Percentage of respondents for all 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone. Whereas Trading securities/shares online had the lowest average Percentage of respondents.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 17 different Responses on X-axis for 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of respondents.

Response E-mail had the maximum Percentage of respondents among all 2 groups, and it was for Smartphone. The minimum Percentage of respondents was observed in Response Trading securities/shares online for Tablet.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 17 different Responses on X-axis for 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of respondents.
For Response E-mail, Smartphone had the highest Percentage of respondents 59.0 among the 2 groups and in Trading securities/shares online, Tablet had the lowest Percentage of respondents 4.0.
Response Watching movies/videos online and Trading securities/shares online had the biggest gap of 19.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of respondents found for Tablet.

On average, the Response E-mail had the highest Percentage of respondents for all 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone. Whereas Trading securities/shares online had the lowest average Percentage of respondents.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 17 different Responses on X-axis for 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Percentage of respondents.
For Response E-mail, Smartphone had the highest Percentage of respondents 59.0 among the 2 groups and in Trading securities/shares online, Tablet had the lowest Percentage of respondents 4.0.

For Response Watching movies/videos online, Tablet had the highest Percentage of respondents among all 17 Responses and it has the lowest Percentage of respondents in Response Trading securities/shares online.
There is a gap of 19.0 between the highest and lowest Percentage of respondents found for Tablet in Response Watching movies/videos online and Trading securities/shares online.
Among the groups, Tablet had the biggest difference in Percentage of respondents. Where the maximum Percentage of respondents was 5.75 times larger than the minimum Percentage of respondents.

On average, the Response E-mail had the highest Percentage of respondents for all 2 groups Tablet, and Smartphone. Whereas Trading securities/shares online had the lowest average Percentage of respondents.

data.Response: Visiting online dating websites/services or apps
